levels.name: Stage 1
levels.description: Write the function and get 3 honey where every honey has three of them
levels.required_blocks:
function make honey up and over(move forward,turn right,move forward,make honey,make honey,move backward,turn left,move backward)
when run(count with counter from 2 to 4 by 1 do(make honey up and over,turn left,repeat(counter) times do(move forward)turn right,repeat(counter) times do(move forward))

levels.name: Stage 2
levels.description: collect all the nectar form teh flowers, where the flower hs 3,9,12,21
levels.required_blocks:
function get nectar parameter(dir,counter)(if dir=left do(turn left)else(turn right),repeat 3 times do(move forward),repeat counter times do(get nectar)repeat 3 times do(move backward),if dir=left do(turn right)else(turn left)
couter with counter from 3 to 21 by 3 do(move forward if path to the left do(get  nectar dir(left) counter (counter)),turn right,move forward,turn left,if path to the right do(get nectar dir(right),counter(counter)))

levels.name: Stage 1
levels.description: maze of "Frozen" or "Ice Age" themed puzzles where the goal is to guide a character through a path to collect an acorn

levels.name: Stage 2
levels.description: maze of "Frozen" or "Ice Age" themed puzzles where the goal is to guide a character through a path to collect an item.
levels.required_blocks: repeat until acorn do(if path ahead do(move forward)else(if path to the left do(turn left,move forward)else(if path to the right do(turn right,move forward)))

levels.name: Stage 3
levels.description: Bee Maze puzzle,a bee  must follow a path to collect nectar from flowers in a specific order or quantity,the quantity is 1,2,2,3,3,3,4,4
levels.required_blocks: counter with counter form 1 to 4 by 1 do(turn left,move forward,turn right,repeat 4 times do(if at flower do (repeat counter times do (get nectar))move forward)repeat  4 times do (move backward))

levels.name: Stage 4
levels.description: where the bee must collect honey from honeycombs with a specific amount at each tile.
levels.required_blocks: counter with counter  from 0 to 8 by 2 do(counter with counter2 from 0 to 8 by 2 do(repeat counter+counter2)times do(make honey)move forward)repeat 5 times do (move backward),turn left,move forward,turn right)

levels.name: Stage 5
levels.description: where the bee must collect honey from honeycombs with a specific amount at each tile.
levels.required_blocks: repeat 5 times do(repeat 5 times do (if at honeycomb do(while honey>0))move forward)repeat 5 times do (move backward)turn left,move forward,turn right)
